Row.Text: Ahoy, bucko! Ye’ve gone on account with those who ken no lord but the sea and the salt. Weigh anchor, then, an see if it be gold or Jack Ketch at the end of yer gangway. The writ’s been signed, an the devil’s afoot.
Since the Republic of Pirates are unable to train Settlers, unlock the Ports of Call Civic to give the Buccaneer Unique Commander a charge to create a new Town.
